title: Power on the Poggio: Lotte Kopecky Aiming to Detonate San Remo Women
content:
World champion will make Tour de France GC a key objective for first time in her career without losing focus on classics: 'We are curious how far we can go.'

Read the full article at Power on the Poggio: Lotte Kopecky Aiming to Detonate San Remo Women on Velo.
author: sstokes
